campaign.title: Dashboard Tour
campaign.subject: Your dashboard explained: find everything in 5 minutes
campaign.description: Complete walkthrough of the command center dashboard

slides.title: Your Dashboard Tour
slides.narration: Welcome to your dashboard tour. In the next five minutes, you'll know exactly where everything is and how to use it. Your entire business presence—managed from one place.

slides.title: Dashboard Overview
slides.narration: Here's your dashboard layout. At the top: quick stats showing your key metrics at a glance. Below that: action items—things that need your attention. Recent activity showing what's happened. And your navigation menu to access everything else.

slides.title: Quick Stats
slides.narration: Your quick stats bar shows profile views this week, new inquiries, recent reviews, and upcoming events. Click any stat to see details. Green arrows mean you're up from last week, red means down.

slides.title: Action Items
slides.narration: Action items are things that need your attention. Reviews waiting for response, listings that need updating, events to post, content to approve. We prioritize them by importance. Clear these regularly to keep everything running smoothly.

slides.title: Navigation
slides.narration: Your navigation menu. Listings: manage your business profiles. Events: create and manage events. Content: articles, posts, announcements. Reviews: monitor and respond. Analytics: see your performance data. Settings: customize your experience.

slides.title: Analytics Deep Dive
slides.narration: Click Analytics for deeper insights. Traffic sources show where visitors come from. Engagement shows how they interact. Conversions track actions like calls and clicks. Trends show your performance over time. Export any report as needed.

slides.title: Pro Tips
slides.narration: Pro tips for your dashboard. Check it daily—takes two minutes. Clear action items weekly so nothing falls through cracks. Review analytics monthly to spot trends. And learn the keyboard shortcuts for speed—press question mark to see them all.

slides.title: Explore Your Dashboard
slides.narration: Ready to explore? Go to your dashboard now and try navigating to each section. Or watch the full video tour for a detailed walkthrough. Your command center is ready—time to take control.
